name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping My Cause - Shopping With Benefits

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shop at your favorite online stores and automatically donate a portion of what you spend to the cause of your choice.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shop at your favorite online stores and automatically donate a portion of what you spend to the cause of your choice at no additional cost to you!

When you shop online with our Shopping With Benefitsâ„¢  add-on for Chrome, your browser will automatically notify a participating retailer that a portion of your purchase goes to the cause of your choice.

Visit http://www.helpingmycause.com to learn more.
